definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Every streams around the village of Shanghailuo flow into the mighty Changjiang here.
sentences.chinese: 上海螺村周圍的每一條小溪都在這裏流入長江。

sentences.english: It is unique in the world of the conch-shaped spiral Sightseeing Tower.
sentences.chinese: 它是世界獨一無二的海螺形螺旋觀光塔。

sentences.english: She and her husband Lao He collected the first bag of discarded shoes in Shanghailuo village.
sentences.chinese: 她和丈夫老和撿了上海螺村的第一袋廢鞋。

sentences.english: It was a strange rousing noise, that made the heart beat.
sentences.chinese: 這奇特的海螺聲令人心顫。

sentences.english: When she returned with the conch, they were waiting and watching.
sentences.chinese: 當她帶着海螺回來的時候，它們等待並看着。

sentences.english: Therefore, conches are blown in Buddhist meetings.
sentences.chinese: 故今法會之際常吹鳴海螺。

sentences.english: Sister Zhang and her husband Lao He collected the first bag of discarded shoes in Shanghailuo village.
sentences.chinese: 上海螺村的第一袋廢鞋是張姐和老和收撿的。

definition: shell/conch/cowry/mother of pearl/hard outer skin/also pr. [bei4 qiao4]
grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
mussels/bivalves grown in rivers and lakes
